section-header.title: About us
section-header.description: We strive to be the best luxury parquet brand in Croatia.

locations.heading: Locations
locations.description: We have offices in Zagreb, Varaždin, Osijek and Split.

our-motivation.heading: Our motivation
our-motivation.description: We are passionate about parquet and we are always looking for new ways to improve our products and services.

certificate.heading: Our Certificates
certificate.description: We are certified by the European standard EN ISO 9001:2008 and EN ISO 14001:2004.

descriptions.split: Come and visit us in Split.
descriptions.osijek: Come and visit us in Osijek.
